design_decisions.decision: Typography-Led Minimalism with Inter (one font family)
design_decisions.rationale: 2026 trend away from multiple font pairings. Inter has weight variation (100-900) to create hierarchy without visual noise. Tech industry standard, excellent readability.
design_decisions.impact: Cleaner, more professional, less 'personality' but more clarity and credibility

design_decisions.rationale: Tech-forward aesthetic, reduces eye strain, differentiates from generic light portfolios, aligns with developer/AI audience expectations in 2026.
design_decisions.impact: Modern, cutting-edge feel, distinguishes Mike's site from typical corporate portfolios

design_decisions.decision: Neon Cyan (#00D9FF) as Secondary Accent (alongside existing Indigo #4F46E5)
design_decisions.rationale: 2026 trend toward cyber-inspired accents for AI/tech brands. Creates visual POP. Signals futuristic/cutting-edge positioning. Differentiates hover states. Adds energy without chaos.
design_decisions.impact: Site POPS - electric hover states, futuristic vibe, differentiates from competitors

design_decisions.decision: JetBrains Mono for Technical Elements (code, tech stacks, metrics)
design_decisions.rationale: 2026 'Technical Mono' trend - signals technical authenticity. Differentiates technical content from body text. Aligns with developer audience. Premium aesthetic.
design_decisions.impact: Technical credibility, modern trend adoption, visual variety without adding second primary font

design_decisions.rationale: Creates visual rhythm, ensures consistency, makes layouts predictable, follows modern design system best practices. Scalable from 4px to 128px.
design_decisions.impact: Consistent spacing across all pages, professional polish, easier to maintain

design_decisions.rationale: Premium feel, improves scannability, guides attention, signals confidence (not cramming content), aligns with minimalist 2026 aesthetic.
design_decisions.impact: Site feels high-quality and intentional, not crowded or desperate
